items.summary: arXiv:2602.21246v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present a deep-learning-based approach for identifying dark matter haloes in cosmological N-body simulations. Our framework consists of a volumetric Convolutional Neural Network to classify individual simulation particles as eith…

items.title: The DECam MAGIC Survey: Uncovering the Tidal Tails of the Crater II Dwarf Galaxy
items.summary: arXiv:2602.21283v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Crater II (CraII), a large and low-density dwarf spheroidal galaxy, has unusual observed properties that are difficult to reproduce in cold dark matter simulations. Ongoing tidal disruption may help explain the discrepancies, as evi…
